data.fullContent: The size of a heating unit is much less important than what it does. When you buy a unit, remember that it's important to compare the efficiency rating between units to make sure you're getting the best deal. Also, make sure you know the amount of space the unit can heat. When you know this along with the price, you can make an informed decision about how much you want to spend. If you have a smaller budget, ask about smaller units for your home. Many people are unaware of how much of an impact a smaller unit can have on their electricity bill.

q1.translation: 加热装置的大小远没有它的用途重要。当你买一个单元的时候，记住比较单元之间的效率等级是很重要的，以确保你得到了最好的交易。
